body:
When I upvote or downvote something, then refresh the page my vote value disappears. It correcly tracks that I voted something up or down, but wipes away the value of my vote.

This is exactly one of the things that drove me away from reddit, their sneaky vote shadow bans to silences anyone who they dont like.
body_html:
When I upvote or downvote something, then refresh the page my vote value disappears. It correcly tracks that I voted something up or down, but wipes away the value of my vote.

This is exactly one of the things that drove me away from reddit, their sneaky vote shadow bans to silences anyone who they dont like.
title: Is voting broken or is it just me ?

body: Ruqqus is [open source](https://github.com/ruqqus/ruqqus), you can see exactly how it handles it if you're worried about it being "sneaky"
body_html: Ruqqus is open source, you can see exactly how it handles it if you're worried about it being "sneaky"

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

body:
i down voted your comment. it remembers the fact that i voted, but isnt counting the value. so you are still at 1 point.

if wouldnt mind voting on this comment, to see if it works for  you

body:
ruqqus uses [vote fuzzing](https://ruqqus.com/post/86i/):

> **Note:** Ruqqus uses "vote fuzzing" to combat bots and manipulation. You might see a post's vote count fluctuate slightly.

This might be what you are noticing here.
body_html:
ruqqus uses vote fuzzing:

Note: Ruqqus uses "vote fuzzing" to combat bots and manipulation. You might see a post's vote count fluctuate slightly.

This might be what you are noticing here.

body: Your vote actually does count, but it isn't reflected in the total score until Ruqqus's system refreshes it. It's like this for everyone.
body_html: Your vote actually does count, but it isn't reflected in the total score until Ruqqus's system refreshes it. It's like this for everyone.

body: I dont think so... if fuzzing perfectly cancels one vote up or down on anything...and makes it seem like no vote was cast... it seems very reliably that way.
body_html: I dont think so... if fuzzing perfectly cancels one vote up or down on anything...and makes it seem like no vote was cast... it seems very reliably that way.
